018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.nio.file.Files;
023import java.nio.file.Path;
024import java.util.Objects;
025import java.util.logging.Level;
026import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpSetDisplayPassword;
027import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ConfigureQemu;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
030import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
031import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
032import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
033import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
034import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
035
036/**
037 * The Class DisplayController.
038 */
039@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
040public class DisplayController extends Component {
041
042    public static final String DISPLAY_PASSWORD_FILE = "display-password";
043    private String currentPassword;
044    private String protocol;
045    private final Path configDir;
046
047    /**
048     * Instantiates a new Display controller.
049     *
050     * @param componentChannel the component channel
051     * @param configDir 
052     */
053    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic")
054    public DisplayController(Channel componentChannel, Path configDir) {
055        super(componentChannel);
056        this.configDir = configDir;
057        fire(new WatchFile(configDir.resolve(DISPLAY_PASSWORD_FILE)));
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * On configure qemu.
062     *
063     * @param event the event
064     */
065    @Handler
066    public void onConfigureQemu(ConfigureQemu event) {
067        if (event.state() == State.TERMINATING) {
068            return;
069        }
070        protocol
071            = event.configuration().vm.display.spice != null ? "spice" : null;
072        updatePassword();
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Watch for changes of the password file.
077     *
078     * @param event the event
079     */
080    @Handler
081    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
082    public void onFileChanged(FileChanged event) {
083        if (event.path().equals(configDir.resolve(DISPLAY_PASSWORD_FILE))) {
084            updatePassword();
085        }
086    }
087
088    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
089    private void updatePassword() {
090        if (protocol == null) {
091            return;
092        }
093
094        String password;
095        Path dpPath = configDir.resolve(DISPLAY_PASSWORD_FILE);
096        if (dpPath.toFile().canRead()) {
097            logger.finer(() -> "Found display password");
098            try {
099                password = Files.readString(dpPath);
100            } catch (IOException e) {
101                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> "Cannot read display"
102                    + " password: " + e.getMessage());
103                return;
104            }
105        } else {
106            logger.finer(() -> "No display password");
107            return;
108        }
109
110        if (Objects.equals(this.currentPassword, password)) {
111            return;
112        }
113        logger.fine(() -> "Updating display password");
114        fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpSetDisplayPassword(protocol, password)));
115    }
116
117}
